#summary Timeline of major events

A brief history of the Gears project.

  * 2008/09/11 - Google launches Search With My Location on mobile devices. ([http://googlemobile.blogspot.com/2008/09/introducing-mobile-search-with-my.html story])

  * 2008/08/27 - !YouTube Multi-Video Upload ([http://www.youtube.com/my_videos_multiupload site]) switches from a custom plugin to Gears.

  * 2008/08/22 - [http://gearsblog.blogspot.com/2008/08/gears-04-is-here.html Gears 0.4] is released! It includes the Geolocation API, Blob object, and [http://code.google.com/apis/gears/upcoming/history.html more].
  * 2008/08/22 - !LastMinute.com adds geolocation support to their [http://m.lastminute.com/fonefood/ mobile application].

  * 2008/07/02 - !WordPress 2.6 uses Gears to improve performance. ([http://en.blog.wordpress.com/2008/07/02/gears/ story])

  * 2008/05/28 - Google Gears celebrates 1st birthday at Google I/O conference, and [http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2008/05/happy-birthday-google-gears.html announces]:
    * New name (simply "Gears")
    * Upcoming platforms (Opera, Firefox 3, Safari)
    * Direction for future APIs (not just offline!)
  * 2008/05/28 - [http://messaging.myspace.com/ MySpace Mail Search] is released using Gears. ([http://developer.myspace.com/Community/blogs/devteam/archive/2008/05/29/myspace-mail-search-with-gears-released-google-i-o-presentation-slides.aspx story])

  * 2008/04/02 - Mobile version of Picasa Web Albums adds offline support. ([http://googlephotos.blogspot.com/2008/03/more-good-news-for-mobile.html story])
  * 2008/03/31 - Google Docs adds offline support and desktop integration. ([http://googledocs.blogspot.com/2008/03/bringing-cloud-with-you.html story])

  * 2008/03/03 - Gears adds support for [http://gearsblog.blogspot.com/2008/03/google-gears-in-your-pocket.html Windows Mobile] devices.
  * 2008/03/03 - [http://www.buxfer.com/blog/2008/03/04/offline-access-from-your-windows-mobile-device Buxfer] and [http://blogs.zoho.com/writer/zoho-writer-extends-mobile-support-adds-offline-capability-for-windows-mobile-using-google-gears/ Zoho] launch Gears-enabled mobile applications.

  * 2008/02/14 - [http://code.google.com/apis/gears/upcoming/history.html Google Gears 0.2] is released!

  * 2007/11/26 - [http://www.zoho.com/ Zoho] Writer supports offline editing. ([http://blogs.zoho.com/general/zoho-writer-supports-offline-editing/ story])

  * 2007/08/21 - [http://www.zoho.com/ Zoho] Writer supports offline reading. ([http://blogs.zoho.com/general/offline-support-comments-in-zoho-writer/ story])

  * 2007/06/05 - [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/ Remember The Milk] gets offline support. ([http://blog.rememberthemilk.com/2007/06/tasks-on-plane.html story])

  * 2007/05/31 - [http://www.google.com/reader/ Google Reader] gets offline support. ([http://googlereader.blogspot.com/2007/05/oh-sam-i-am-can-i-read-it-on-tram.html story])
  * 2007/05/31 - Public launch of Google Gears.
